alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 3:18AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Telfair, Wheeler and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 400 AM EST... At 318 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Workmore, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Uvalda, Ailey, Scotland, Towns, Spring Hill, Landsburg, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Jordan, Charlotteville and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
